title: more lag
body: once again horrible lag shooting up to 3k in ranked, my team then proceeds to treat me like shit belittling me the entire time telling me to just leave the match then. now watch as every single one of them reports me and ontop of that i just lost lp this is why i'm starting to think league is becoming a fucking joke. half the time no rioters come on the boards, and even when they do it's a response that follows 'do a speed test" you do the speed tests you tell them what's wrong you go in circles nothing gets settled and then you do it all over again till it gets to the point where you don't want to play league anymore. i have given my internet provider in my last post about this nothing has been done to move forward, i'm sorry but the game shooting my ping up to 3k is not enjoyable and it only happens in this game any other game with a server in chicago or the us my ping is fine.

replies.body: I've responded to your posts before and offered assistance in depth, so it's not really fair to claim we aren't around.  It sucks to hear that you're having lag issues again, and tests or steps requests exist to help us find the problem as well as rule out possibilities.  Contact our tech team through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) logs, and we'll be happy to help.  Hopefully we can figure this out!
